behavior.functionBody: let p = await this.getStringVariable('local_name'); return '${workspaceFolder}/user/' + p;

filePathToBreakpointGroupNames.functionBody: if (filePathStr.includes('/kern/')) { return ['kernel']; } else if (filePathStr.includes('/user/libs/') || filePathStr.includes('/libs/')) { let userApps = ['exit', 'forktest', 'forktree', 'hello', 'pgdir', 'sh', 'sleep', 'sleepkill', 'spin', 'testbss', 'waitkill', 'yield']; return userApps.map(name => '${workspaceFolder}/user/' + name); } else if (filePathStr.includes('/user/')) { let parts = filePathStr.split('/'); let filename = parts[parts.length - 1].split('.')[0]; return ['${workspaceFolder}/user/' + filename]; } else { return ['kernel']; }

breakpointGroupNameToDebugFilePaths.functionBody: if (groupName === 'kernel') { return ['${workspaceFolder}/bin/kernel']; } else if (groupName.startsWith('${workspaceFolder}/user/')) { let parts = groupName.split('/'); let filename = parts[parts.length - 1]; return ['${workspaceFolder}/obj/user/__user_' + filename + '.out']; } else { return []; }
